note.text: The long-term sustainability of a project depends on a sense of local ownership. Even after you've spent considerable time gathering information, there will still be aspects your counterparts understand better than you.

Work with local leaders, get their perspective, and be sure they agree with the plans you've developed together. Whenever possible, put your counterparts in the lead. Allow them to take credit for successes and ownership of potential failures.
